about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: About Children's Fever Medicine Dosage Calculator

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: The Children's Fever Medicine Dosage Calculator helps parents and caregivers quickly and easily find accurate fever medicine dosages based on their child's weight and age. Our goal is to protect children's health and safety through proper medication use.

features.title: Key Features
items: Accurate dosage calculation by weight and age
Support for major fever medicines: Tylenol (acetaminophen), Motrin, and Advil (ibuprofen)
Calculations based on FDA-approved product labeling
Dosing interval and maximum dose guidance
Related product information (US version)

safety.title: Safety
safety.content: This calculator was developed with reference to IEC 62304 medical device software safety standards. All calculations are based on FDA-approved product labeling, and data validation is performed at build time to prevent incorrect information from being deployed.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This calculator is a reference tool. Always consult with a doctor or pharmacist before administering medication. This service does not replace medical advice and is not liable for adverse effects from medication use.

creator.title: Creator

opensource.title: Technology Stack
opensource.content: This service is built with Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, and hosted on Vercel. It uses an architecture designed with medical safety as the top priority.
